body.text: Sending A Card to Webex Teams
To generate a Card in Webex Teams, you'll need to include the card's JSON in a POST request to the [Webex /messages API](https://developer.webex.com/docs/api/v1/messages/create-a-message).

A message request to send a card looks very much like a "regular" message request, except that the request body will include an `attachments` attribute which includes data that tells Webex how to render a card.

The `attachments` field is an array that will include a single object made up of two fields:

* `contentType`: always set to "application/vnd.microsoft.card.adaptive"

* `content`: this is your card's design JSON, possibly copied from the designer

When sending the card data, the Webex message object must also include either a `text` or `markdown` field for use by clients that cannot render cards. This text should convey information about the card's content and provide an alternative method to interact with the card's actions.
